##CLEANING DATA

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
fmcg = read.csv("C:/Users/Imam/Downloads/FMCG_2022_2024.csv")
View(fmcg)
```

```{r}
glimpse(fmcg)
```

```{r}
unique(FMCG$category)

```

```{r}
fmcg_filtered <- fmcg %>%
  filter(category == "SnackBar", region == "PL-South") %>%
  select(date, units_sold, price_unit) %>%
  arrange(date)
```

```{r}
fmcg_daily_units <- fmcg_filtered %>%
  group_by(date) %>%
  summarise(
    daily_units = sum(units_sold, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  arrange(date)

glimpse(fmcg_daily_units)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
write_csv(fmcg_daily_units, "snackbar_PLSouth.csv")
```
